Changed the Auto Reject to one day For testing purpose and submitted an RITM. 2)NOW -1595 - Form Development - Catalog item, Updated variables, UI policies, help texts, client scripts Flow Development - Analyzed the flow for TMTT.  Ayo 1.Added not valid choice in the operating effectiveness field of the control test record 2.found a problem on working as per requirement as when we choose control effectiveness as ineffective and operating effectiveness as not valid as effective 3.checked all business rules on the control test which effect the population of the status of control as not-compliant</u_project_work> <u_remarks/> <u_resourse display_value="Amal Madhav">5a8898a98381e650a946f896feaad37d</u_resourse> <u_start_time>2025-03-18 11:00:22</u_start_time> <u_work_hour>6.26</u_work_hour> <u_work_notes/> </u_project_effort> </record_update>
